document_data.caption: [[Isarr Kronenstrom]] of [[Icewind Dale]].
document_data.mainbody: '''''Dungeon'' issue 220''' was released in November of 2013 in online format only. It contained the following articles related to the [[Forgotten Realms]]:

Index.Magic: {{P|''[[climber's rope]]''|45}} • {{P|''[[fire arrow]]''|42}} • {{P|''[[frostwolf pelt]]''|36,42}} • {{P|''[[lamp of discerning]]''|43}}• {{P|''[[savage mask]]''|53}} • {{P|''[[sylvan charm]]''|47}}
